A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where does one start with this? For a quick summary\, this is not well written. It feels more like a forced term paper written the night before without any clear understanding of the material. The Expanded Universe books generally fall short of the movies but even the worst of these are gold in bringing you to a galaxy far far away then this monstrosity. Sound and visuals were good enough to bump it to one star..
